description: This Kotlin source file provides focus management utilities for Android TV UI using Jetpack Compose. It defines an object 'TVFocus' with a focus requester helper function and an extension function 'dpadFocusable()' that applies focusable behavior, visual effects, and key event handling for DPAD navigation.

classes.name: TVFocus
classes.description: A utility object providing focus management helpers, such as creating and remembering FocusRequester instances for initial focus.

methods.name: rememberFirstItemFocusRequester
methods.description: Creates and remembers a FocusRequester instance to set initial focus on the first focusable item.

methods.name: dpadFocusable
methods.description: A Modifier extension that makes a composable focusable, adds visual scale and padding effects when focused, and sets up key event handling for DPAD navigation.
